website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable and versatile option that seamlessly adapts from a swing to a rocker to soothe even the fussiest babies.
pros: The feature-packed swing mode boasts multiple audio settings, 6 speeds, side-to-side and back and forth motions, and a mobile for visual stimulation
Removable rocker can easily be carried from room to room and offers 2 soothing vibration settings
Comfortable seat with a 5-point safety harness
Can be powered by batteries or an outlet
cons: It's pricey and the swing takes up considerable floor space

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but creaks loud after time.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great, but after six months of use it creaks really loud when it swings. Luckily it seems to be consistent enough that our kid is still able to crank out a power nap in it. Attached a video to show what I'm talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Critter

customer_reviews.title: Not a Happy Baby or Momma
customer_reviews.text: It was NOT easy to assemble. If you got a part together wrong, you couldn't get it back apart. One of the little "snap" things went down the tube, and I could not get it.... had to use a bolt instead. When it swings, it is very loud. I am not too impressed for the cost of this swing that was supposed to put any baby to sleep. So far, my little girl does not like it. Hoping she will eventually.... way too hard to disassemble and return. :( The vibration does not work while plugged in... you have to have batteries for that.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ericksen

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver! We didnt purchase until my little one was a few months old and I wish we would have had it from day one! It's great quality, soft cushioning, comfortable and safe! Has different music tones and volumes which has been super helpful in settling out little one down. Nice that we have the option of turning the swing in different directions as we like to limit screen time and yet we as adults still want to watch our shows. Nice having the option to remove the seat from the base and carry it from room to room with us if we need to. I have nothing negative to say about this swing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Oosh23

customer_reviews.title: Super happy!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions relatively easy to follow for anyone who has assembled something before. Swing clicks when it rocks but that is standard for a baby swing, it really isnt too loud nor annoying. Plays sounds and lullabies at multiple volume options. Level 1 is gentle up to level 6 will soothe the most fussy of babies. Honestly only noticed an issue with the adjustable recline. It is supposed to have 2 levels but it appears mine only has one, but no biggie. Super happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Frye

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase, some modifications were made for the Vibration after that this is a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Easy to assemble, works great after minor fix, my baby likes the vibration, i really like the rockers ability to rock from side to side then front to back with a push of a button, the rockers recline doesn’t lay to flat but rather at a slight incline so your baby can see the bears above CONS: Bears dont move; if they could spin from its base at least it would be a better If you read the reviews below, the vibration from the battery housing is abnormally loud, using a simple hair band around the D battery before install will quiet the vibrations
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: My baby becomes a shrimp or a ball while sleeping she cant stretch her legs and hands. You can't use it for long hours not safe and I have to constantly keep and eye. No head support. Makes noise. I wish i had taken some pictures but I am not happy at all and returned it finally I brought a bassinet cradle which has flat base.
customer_reviews.author: Rohini

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 3 weeks...
customer_reviews.text: This swing was a great swing for less than 1 month. Then the motor decided to not work, swing became extremely loud, and wouldn't swing but for 2 seconds and stop... I figured it has something to do with my daughters weight, but shes only 15 pounds... I have started the process of contacting support in Hope's for a new motor peice, with out having to ship back the whole 30 pound swing.... I'll revise my review depending on how well customer support treats me.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & Functional
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s affordable and serves its purpose. It also has different tunes, heart-beat and forest sounds. It makes some clicking noise when it swings, but nothing abnormally loud. The bears do not rotate; they are stationary. Had an issue with the bottom base installation parts to click in place. I had to jimmy it a bit and try not to scratch the metal while attaching. Overall, I’m happy with the purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl  ShopGuy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible swing!
customer_reviews.text: This swing is as all the reviews noted and it’s TERRIBLE!!! The vibration is noisy even after I taped the battery cover shut. The motor is LOUD and the swing power is TERRIBLE compared to any swing and fisher price snuggabunny. I want a refund and to return this swing. I’ve diligently tried it for my son on different levels of happy or sound asleep. Total bummer purchase. I rarely fail on amazon but the reviews were plus minus and with the rocker I thought it’d be worth a shot. I was wrong. Easy to assemble. Lots of packaging.Loud motor and vibration feature would keep any baby awake rather than lull them to sleep
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service with Graco
customer_reviews.text: Very cute product. Graco customer support is not great and they are not very helpful. Product came with a cut in one of the internal electrical wires. Called Graco and was advised could not get just a replacement part and needed to send the whole unit back after already taking a long time to assemble it. They did offer to send the replacement first but only gave 7 days to return the broken swing. With a new baby due anyday now it's not something I want to have to worry about. Amazon customer support was more helpful but unfortunately do not have the time or energy to break this thing down and send back. Disappointed it came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: not for big babies
customer_reviews.text: Kinda bummed about this. The swing itself is nice. And I love that I can take the carrying handle off the seat. But my daughter, only 5 months old, has already outgrown it. Weight wise, she is ok. But her height? 28 inches and her head it at the top of the seat, right at the recline handle. She actually has to sit cockeyed in the seat with her butt to one side and her head to the other side just to get comfortable. She outgrew it at about 4 months. But we still use it occasionally, as it's come in handy during travel and vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McCuen

customer_reviews.title: Swing stop working after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: This was a really good price compared to the stores but now having it for 4 months the swing doesn’t work my new used it when she came home from the hospital. We use it the swing for 2 months then the swing just stop working one day. Now my 4 month old is very active and alert, the swing would be great to calm her down but we can’t use it what a waste of money. Don’t buy from here go to the store at least you can return it. I should have read the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Froxtrot

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Can swing and rock in many directions. Seat is also detachable for mobility around home. Cons: The nature sounds and music are barely audible even on the highest volume setting. Also the sound clarity and quality are poor. You would think a company this old and financially established, would invest in a market competitive sound machine design. Furthermore, the mobile does not move. If the sound machine was any good, then the ridiculous amount of space this thing takes up would be worth sacrificing. I have twins so I ordered two, but am returning the one that has not been opened. If you are buying this for the music or sound features, you've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: nisuelli

customer_reviews.title: Love it already!
customer_reviews.text: We received this last night and immediately set it up. Set up was pretty easy, took me about 15-20 mins alone. My son loves swaying back and forth. Love the many sound settings. The only negative is it takes up quite a bit of space but I'm not deducting a star for that bc that's to be expected of a swing like this. Also amazon has the best price for this item anywhere. And shipping was SO FAST! It arrived way before it was expected to.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it. Removable seat is a great feature.
customer_reviews.text: This swing works very well for my two month old. I love that the seat comes off and can be used as a vibrating bouncer seat that I can carry anywhere. Also nice that the swing seat reclines so you can adjust for your baby to nap or look at the world (or the tv cause hey sometimes momma’s gotta get some stuff done). I like the gender neutral look it has too. It is enormous, but so is any other swing. Also some babies might find it a bit gentle. My baby seems to really like it though. She really enjoys the bear mobile. I do wish the mobile moved.
customer_reviews.author: Turducken

customer_reviews.title: Life-saver
customer_reviews.text: My 5-month-old LOVES this swing and has since we brought him home. Although the music it plays will eventually haunt your dreams after listening to it every day for months, it's really not bad for child toys music. And the swing itself looks very comfortable. The vibrating function calms my son when he's tired and fussy. My husband and I joke about wishing they'd make a large version of this for adults. This is a purchase that is definitely worth the price. If we hadn't had this the first few months it would have been difficult to ever prepare meals or go to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Came bent
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, swings in general I am all for. They are a god send when caring for an infant. This product though, came bent. We were able to bend the bars to make it work, but it was definitely damaged on arrival. This was a gift for my husband's best friend and his wife. We offered to return it and get a new one for them, but they declined as they didn't want to wait and we were able to make it work. The low score in ease of assembly was specifically due to the deformity of the support rods. It took three of us manhandling it at once to get it into a serviceable position.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Love this swing
customer_reviews.text: Love this swing. With my first son I had such trouble with finding a good swing. This one is super light yet durable. The swing speeds are awesome and the swing actually gets going pretty good which is nice since it's the only place my son will sleep. My son is now 7 months and a 20lb little chunk and the swing is holding up great still. I will say it is noisey though. It was nice and quiet for the first month and slowly got louder. It is slightly frustrating since we use it at night but I've gotten use to the sound. Other than that I would recommend this swing to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Manda10210

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: Verrrrry cute swing. Very sturdy and nicer than the photo. Very nice materials. Love how you can take the seat off and carry it around and it rocks (mannually) and vibrates. Love how it can be battery opperated or plugged in. Well worth the money. One and only complaint is the volume. You can BARLEY hear the little lullabys or the "nature sounds" it plays even on the highest volume setting. Doubt baby will hardly hear them either. Oh and also the little bear mobile is a little mosleading. Its stationary it doesnt like spin or anything. So the sounds and the mobile are kinda lame But i still love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador solis

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I received this swing less than a week ago. 2 days after I got it, it started making a really loud clicking noise when it was on. I emailed Graco hoping to talk about replacement of the part and got no answer. Yesterday we turn it on and on full power the swing will barely move. It seems to have a short in the motor. After taking a hour to put together, I now have to take it completely apart, buy a box because I threw out the old one and send back. Completely disappointed. When it worked for a day my daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMandaP

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how we lived without this before
customer_reviews.text: I have a daughter with colic and as all you parents in my boat know sometimes it's very hard to get our little ones to be calm and happy or even sleep. Well, this swing is the ANSWER TO YOUR PRAYERS. It rocks back and forth, side to side, plays white noise, vibrates and has 3 different inclines. Some days, this is the only way I can get my little to take a nap. My husband and I found it a little cumbersome to put together following the instruction booklet, I definitely recommend Googling the video that walks you through assembly step by step, so much easier. This swing is worth every penny, I wish we had it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki B

customer_reviews.title: No longer working after 1. 5 months!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this swing. I purchased because weight limit was 30 lbs. Disappointed in the mobile. I wish it turned and that it had a reflective surface like other swings do. Small things , yes. Overall very satisfied. Update swing no longer working after 1.5 months. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy open box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an “open box” deal. Don’t do that ever!! The shoulder straps were not attached looked like someone had ripped them off! Bought this very early in my pregnancy due to a Black Friday sale in November and it’s June and just put it together everything is okay but that... but still if it says “inspected” it should be okay and it’s not
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Terrible bed angle
customer_reviews.text: The angle in the bed part is horrible for a baby. My baby has acid reflux and it’s such a drastic angle that she always spits up when I put her in. Not only that, but it forces her head forward and that’s really scary because she could cut off her airway. I wish the bed would adjust more flat. I would have returned it but I thought she would grow into it... unfortunately its getting worse.. now I have to sell it online 😩
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Worst swing I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for 6 months. Worst swing I've ever bought. And probably the last graco product i'll ever buy. Vibration requires batteries which are not easy to install. Not easy to clean. Insert CONSTANTLY slides down so buckles don't fit right. Hard to set up, directions clearly made in china and not easy to understand. Dont waste your money on a graco swing.... buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Bad units good product when it works
customer_reviews.text: Since purchasing this product, amazon lost and had to re-send this item. In addition, we’re now working on our third unit. This first one had an issue with the leg where you plug the power into and we’ve had the motor break on our last one. Graco customer support is slow to reply unless you call, but once you jump through the hoops they will do good. The swing isn’t too loud, the music plays for an hour, and it got my baby to sleep for up to 10 hours in the first 6 weeks which was a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Zoelle Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after 1.5 month
customer_reviews.text: we started use it after 1.5 month of purchase date. so it was pretty brand new, the music buttons sometimes work -sometimes doesn't,.and overall our baby doesn't like the swing .so we tried return it , we explained it to seller , but they don't care , it's already over 30 days return policy . good business !
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great swing, can be noisy.
customer_reviews.text: We overall LOVE this swing/rocker. The only drawback we have to it is when we use the vibration on the seat. It vibrates so loud because the battery part leaves room for the battery to wiggle around. I put a couple hair ties around the batteries and closed the door back up and it fixed the noise.
customer_reviews.author: MEmbick

customer_reviews.title: Decent Swing, No Frills
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my infant. Have used this for 5 months now. Like that it can move forward/back or side to side. Not impressed with the nature sounds. The music lasts approximately 45 minutes before shutting off and has a good variety. Often use only the music to put baby to sleep in crib. As others have commented, wish that it had a rotating mobile but wasn't willing to pay the extra to get the next model up that had it. Overall satisfied with this and got it at a great price during Black Friday sale.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Griffis

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for rocking upset baby when you're physically worn out
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes our baby just gets angry with life and nothing, including getting cuddled, will soothe him. This has been a nice go-to tool for when both of us are exhausted and not sure what to do to calm our child. The music and nature sounds are a nice touch with a wide variety. The 6-ranges of swinging speeds is also great. I was surprised by how easy it is to use. One downside is that the frame is too large to fit the swing into other rooms in our house than the big open living room and dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Keeps baby safe while doing other things..
customer_reviews.text: This swing is great but if I could go back, I’d probably skip this purchase - mainly because my daughter just looks bored while sitting in it and isn’t entertained by it at all. The music/sound selection could definitely be better and it would help if the mobile was mechanic and gently spun or something. Otherwise, taking the seat out and using it to keep your child safe and in sight while you get ready is nice. Considering how much we spent on this, I’m disappointed we barely got any use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Nice swing and features but just watch the video to hear how LOUD it is with vibration on. Maybe ours is defective?
customer_reviews.author: Bill and Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Nothing smooth about this...
customer_reviews.text: I think the name should be changed from Duetsoothe, our baby weighed 6lbs 13oz when he was born and we used it probably a few weeks after he arrived noticed a knocking sound, it didn’t bother us at first as our son would cry 2 minutes after being in there. Now that he is 3months he can stay in there longer and the knocking (which doesn’t seem to bother him) is unbearable for us, I think this product needs to be reassessed as it would be a nice swing if it wasn’t for the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Babyt27

customer_reviews.title: Love it, must have
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing. It has a permanent spot in our living room. Before this, someone always had to be holding our daughter. Now we can both eat dinner at the same time! And since the pandemic we’ve been home with her all day while trying to work, when she starts getting sleepy we put her in here to nap and she’s out. She naps for longer in here compared to on the floor or in the pack and play. We love this thing, it has really helped us.
customer_reviews.author: CMI

customer_reviews.title: Great Swing
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice swing, love that you can plug it in as well as battery! I did have a hard time trying to put it together, the directions had pictures but they were not very clear? Had to have my son put it together for me. That said it is very nice now that it is up. Love the fact that you can detach the chair and that the chair can be adjusted to a sit up position as my granddaughter gets older. My daughter ordered a different swing for her home and likes this one so much better. It is sturdy and quiet. Vey happy with this purchase. Would recommend to anyone. Great price as well
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Assembled item per instructions. Motor makes terrible loud clicking noise preventing my baby from relaxing. Very dissatisfied. As a mom with a newborn the last thing I want to do is spend time assembling and disassembling a faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T

customer_reviews.title: Fine gift for new parents
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friends who just recently become parents of a boy. This swing rocker looks well-build and decent price with promotion. They are happy with my gift but complain about the noise that it makes. Some buyers here have also mentioned the creaking sound. My suggestion here is to put a rubber band around the battery. That should solve the problem. Other than the sound, it is still a nice product that comes with many features like nature sounds and white noise. Works on battery and plugin. Multiple directions swing.
customer_reviews.author: Dear MR.J

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson, and he really loves it. I like that it has a seat insert for smaller babies/newborns that can be removed as they get bigger. I like the wide base that keeps it from tipping over. Yes, it takes up a little more than 30 X 30 inches of floor space, but the safety factor is worth it. It was not difficult to assemble single-handedly. I like the music feature. It's not annoying and off-key like some. The white noise option is also nice. I highly recommend this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: I do like the amount of padding in the seat
customer_reviews.text: This swing is very loud. The motor makes a very loud clicking noise and it is impossible to sleep while the swing is on. I contacted graco and they sent a replacement motor very quickly and without cost. This did not did the problem. The swing is still too loud and will be going back. I do like the amount of padding in the seat. Compared to the Fischer price swing this is much softer but much louder. I also like the detachable bouncer feature. I wish I could keep it. It does look well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn I

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2am soothing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the “open box” at a discounted price so when the speeds started to not work properly I thought that’s just what I paid for. After researching and finding a YouTube video, if you simply unplug the swing for 30 seconds and plug it back in, all speeds will work properly. I do wish that the volume could go louder and that the vibration would be less loud but overall, great swing. Perfect for calming baby at 2am! Happy baby, happy mama!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie vorce

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a great investment! Do you love getting things done? Love taking naps? Or maybe you just want to maintain your sanity? Then get this swing! What I love about it: 1. Swings strong enough. (Goes to a 6) 2. Swing can face 2 different directions which is great. We make ours face the window which our baby loves. 3. Sound options are white noises or classical music. 4. Aside from swinging, swing has the options to vibrate. Baby can nap, which means so can I. or I can eat in peace. or get some work done. or just recharge my brain!
customer_reviews.author: funkymonkey

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working at 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I started using this swing in May. My son was 2 months old and didn't want anything to do with it before then. My son is now 6 months old only 17lbs (weight for swing says 30lbs) and it will no longer swing him. I've reached out to bravo with no response. With my last child I used Fisher price and that motor was amazing! She used it until 10 months and even now my niece is using it and that swing is 5 years old. Will never buy graco again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think we would need a swing with our newborn, but boy was I wrong. So helpful, easy to assemble (there's A LOT) and instructions were clear. Only thing is the swing makes a clicking noise when moving side to side. Not loud enough to prevent our little one from sleeping, but kind of annoying. I love the recline and sitting up position options as our boy needs to sit up for a bit after eating instead of full recline.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Loud and clunky.
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism to keep this swinging is loud and clunky sounding when it loses momentum and has to pick back up. It’s so loud in fact that it wakes my baby. Also the cover for the battery compartment eventually gets loose fitting and sounds like a helicopter we had to put duct tape over it to muffle the sound. If you want to get your baby use to loud noises while sleeping....this is the swing for you.
customer_reviews.author: explaintherain

customer_reviews.title: Buy it already!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this swing plugs in but has backup batteries. We use it daily. There are separate batteries for the vibration, but we have never installed them, so I can't comment on that. I love that I can put our little one in and detach the whole seat, so I don't have to have a separate rocker/bouncy seat. It was fairly easy to put together. Included directions were not always the most clear, but even so, many things were common sense. I put it together on my own a week and a half after a C-section, so it's very doable. I have recommended it to a couple of my friends who are now expecting as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Pineda

customer_reviews.title: A swing worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I did not find this swing to be as loud or clicky as other reviewers did. Yes, it makes noise. I haven't seen a single swing that didn't. I use white noise to sleep at night anyway so perhaps that's why it doesn't bother me. I like the reclined option, I like the sound options, I haven't used the detachment option of the seat but I'm sure some moms would find that very helpful. The only complaint Ill verify that another purchaser had said was that the mobile doesn't move (except from the natural swing motion) but my daughter still grabs at the bears. I think this swing was the best quality anyone could expect at its price level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but buy a clip on motorized mobile for extra baby enjoyment!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves loves loves this swing. It doesn’t make a loud clicking sound even though some members of our family have stopped it while it’s been running. (Some reviews cautioned about this.) My only qualm is the mobile and the fact that it doesn’t move. Baby loves to watch the bears move when I manually rotate it. So I bought a clip-on motorized mobile and she loves that. I recommend all parents do that.
customer_reviews.author: M Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read these reviews before I put this on my registry. This swing is soooo obnoxiously loud. My baby is 7 weeks old and cannot sleep through the noise it makes. She is startled and wakes up immediately after she dozed off. The item was added because I loved how it was a 2 in 1 but wishing I wouldnt have added it to my list and purchased the Fisher Price swing my friend recommended instead. Mobile does not move either which was also disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Quit after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 1 month before my baby was born. It has some qualities I really liked. The changeable swing positioning were nice, detaching the swing from the base was helpful, and I liked the options of vibrations, music, and natural sounds. We used it for two months and then it completely stopped swinging. On the highest setting the motor drags and barely moves an empty swing, even less with a baby in the swing. Because I had it a total of three months, I couldn’t return it to Amazon. This was the most expensive thing I bought for my baby so needless to say, I’m pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sanity and life saver!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a different rocker and our daughter never really liked it. My parents rented this when we came to visit and she loved it so much i ordered it on amazon that day so it would be at the door when we came back home! It’s plush with a quiet swinging sound (but not silent), the music works great to rock the little one to sleep when i need a second to eat or clean. Having the option to remove the seat is handy too!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great swing!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this swing! The adjustable back allows us to set him up a little if he's recently been fed, the added padding snuggles him in to keep him cozy, and the two swing directions are great. The swing does creak and the rocker is awkward to move around the house, but nothing that should keep you from considering this swing for your little one. This swing is a bargain! We paid twice as much for the MamaRoo which he hated.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H

customer_reviews.title: Good except the seat area is hard
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good swing. Fits bigger babies, the swing motion is nice, portable lightweight rocker, good sounds. Haven't tried the vibration since I don't have batteries. Baby likes the bears. Only con and biggest let down is that the butt part of the seat is not comfortably padded. The sides of the pillow that hug the baby are padded but not the sitting down area. Very disappointed in that since baby's old swing had padding from a pillow we inserted so I wish that this swing was more comfortable for him to sit longer time. Especially for the price. Might not have ordered it if I knew how hard the seat was. Hopefully baby gets used to it
customer_reviews.author: kitty chemist

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product ever. It stopped working the moment i assembled it and placed my baby in the swing. Now it is not getting dis assembled and i am stuck with faulty product. Swing will work when i switch it on but will stop working as soon as i place my baby in it. Looks like its motor gets disconnected with some weight. I tried to reach graco .. and they are not responsive . Buyers ,Please stay away from buying this low quality graco swing.
customer_reviews.author: Prateek Dwivedi

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: The swing will attempt to go but acts like my son is 50 lbs when he is only 18 lbs. It doesn't have enough oomph. It worked great until this month. My son is only 4 months so i'm really disappointed this swing only lasted that short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Comfy versatile swing
customer_reviews.text: Great swing for under $100. At first I thought the swing was too low, but it is fine. It’s nice the cushions and fabric are removeable for washing. My little one is nicely snuggled in the seat, falling asleep easily. I like that the seat easily detaches from the swing device, to become a rocker. Great for bringing baby with you to other areas of the home, while keeping a close watch of them.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyGirl007

customer_reviews.title: good swing but SO LOUD
customer_reviews.text: it is a good swing, i like that it moves forward and side to side. my baby finds it very comfy, but when set to swing on its own it makes an extremley loud clicking noise. I end up pushing the swing myself because the sound wakes up baby and keeps me from catching a nap. I'm surprised because it is not inexpensive! To me it was not worth the hassle of returning, but I would not recomend due to noise!
customer_reviews.author: bethany

customer_reviews.title: Good swing, loud click, useless transportation.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a pretty good swing, however, tgere is a very loud click that happens once the swing gets going. Sometimes ot will start right when my baby falls asleep. It doesnt seem to bother her too much, but it is terribly annoying when the house is quiet. I like that it plugs in, I also thought I would like that its detachable, but I hardly ever find a need to take the bouncer off and move her. My baby likes it for the most part, but she only ever uses it when shes already asleep. She prefers being bounced and patted, so the swing doesnt help us much. BUT, overall, its still a nice swing.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo381

customer_reviews.title: Great Swing
customer_reviews.text: I give this swing 5 stars. It was fairly easy to assemble. I love the different speeds for swinging and the different musics. Also it is great that you have the option to change orientations also that you can take the "seating" off from the swing. It comes in handy. My baby enjoys this swing and falls asleep in it very often. Happy baby = happy mommy.
customer_reviews.author: MLMcClusky

customer_reviews.title: Unlevel
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble. After using a few times, the whole thing leans from the top and is so crooked. Not even worth trying to ask for a replacement bc it’s not worth having to take this one apart and put together another one. Very disappointed though because it was very pricey!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I loved this swing for my great granddaughter she loves it the clicking sound is not bad at all I love how it sways both ways , you can remove the handle apart from the baby swing and carry to another room with you by being close to you I wish I could had this with my other grandchildren , hope to using this swing for a long time it is great for a smaller rooms does not take up much room have not tried the battery department yet
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complicated assembly but nice finished product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought an open box item...I see why it was opened and sent back. This was not an easy assembly. I do not have an engineering degree but one might be helpful! I needed my husband to muscle one of the rocker legs into the slot. Otherwise it was something one person could do. You really have to study the pictures to make sure the legs/pieces are facing the right direction. However, once it was assembled the music is nice and the swing action is soothing. A minor clicking noise when the swing is moving is not bad- it’s more like white noise. The mobile is stationary so don’t expect it to move but the little bears are cute.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: I Like This Swing
customer_reviews.text: I especially like this swing because you have the option of swinging from front to back or side to side. My great granddaughter love it. the reason I gave it 4 stars and not 5 is because the swing is rate to handle babies up to 30 pounds and up to 24 months. my granddaughter is only 8 months and 20 pound (she's not fat) and the safety harness is too tight (can't fasten it). We got only 2 and a half months of use.
customer_reviews.author: wwjones55

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. I love that you can turn baby in different directions and that you can detach it from the base and use it as another type of rocker on the floor. I have not used the battery power yet, since I keep mine plugged in and don't need to move it. But I'm glad it does have a wireless option if I need it. It plays sounds and my favorite is the heart beat. It does take up a lot of room, but it's really good materials and worth it! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tawni

customer_reviews.title: Great but noisy
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this swing! The only part I don't like, is after 3 months of having it and using it on a daily basis, it squeaks like crazy while swinging now. My baby only weighs 13lbs and it shouldn't be squeaky but it is. After placing batteries in the vibrator I turned it on and it makes a really bad vibration noise against the metal. I made sure it was tightened down and everything was back in place but i had put a wash rag in it to make it quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn tackett

customer_reviews.title: Regret 100%. Incredibly loud. Batteries die every two days
customer_reviews.text: This swing could not be louder. You can hear it from two rooms away. The vibration function doesn't just hum like you would imagine it would. It sounds like a lawnmower. And the swing function click-clacks AND the metal frame creaks. It's impossible for the baby or anyone to sleep anywhere near this swing. Also, the vibration function is not powered by the plug but by batteries which need to be replaced every two days. I seriously regret this purchase and wish I would have just bought a cheap bouncer for the vibration function.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Saves your sanity wish I had bought this weeks ago
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know if I would need a rocker/ bouncer/ swing thing for my newborn so I wait til he was 4 weeks old and completely exhausted to make this purchase and boy am I glad I did. We thought about the expensive $200+ ones but am glad we chose this. For the price and quality it’s excellent. Our baby loves it. It gives me some time to do other things while he’s entertained. Totally worth it. Just wish I bought it right off the bat.
customer_reviews.author: FlashySmile

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great. It’s not only a second pair of hands but it’s also nice to put my daughter in after eating since it sits her up a bit and she has reflux. Now that she’s two months old, she loves the bear mobile. The vibration and swing puts her to sleep as well. FYI, my daughter is in physical therapy and they say to only use things like this for 20 minutes at a time. The floor is better. The directions could be better but it didn’t take me too long to put it together. Make sure you have some time before opening though!
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Much needed help
customer_reviews.text: Definitely like the item. I am giving it only four stars at the moment because I just received it and the installation was very simple -- and the item itself seems sturdy and clean. I will update this review later to see how it hold up with use but for now I think this is a good buy. Really helps sooth the baby - seems safe - has a variety of options - and the ease of use from swing to rocker is most beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Broke While Baby In It
customer_reviews.text: It was a great swing until it fell apart while my baby was in it. Thank God, he was strapped in at the time. I’m giving one star solely on the safety of this issue, since my babies well being is number 1. Before it broke while my baby was in it though, he really enjoyed it. But I can not recommend anything that isn’t safe.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Disselhorst

customer_reviews.title: a gift
customer_reviews.text: it was the perfect gift when my granddaughter was born, help with assisting in her entertainment needs and rocking her to sleep during her daily naps. great product for a reputable company. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Renato Perez

customer_reviews.title: Love it, looks great
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in our living room. It was pretty easy to put together (aside from one time I had user error LOL) and works well. It doesn't seem to go as fast as my son's did 6+ years ago, but I think that's just how the new products are now-a-days. I love that it can be used as a swing in different directions and can also be used as a rocker. I don't know how long the batteries last since we have it plugged into the wall and don't plan to move the swing.I did put a battery in the rocker part for the vibration if/when we choose to use that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my sis her due date was on November and I bought it since September. When we finally use it the product didn't work start making weird noises and we couldn't make it work anymore . I won't not recommend this to anybody I believe is dangerous to put a newborn on something that sounds like an old truck . I try to contact them many times and they denied to do my refund. Not professional very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adri 87

customer_reviews.title: A very good product but not an excellent one
customer_reviews.text: A very good product but not an excellent one, to be honest I love it but it has one flaw. The battery compartment for the vibration unit is a bit too big which does not provide a snug fit for the battery, so when I turn it on it is very loud and not soothing at all. To fix this issue, I had to cut pieces of cardboard and placed it on one side of the battery which stops it from moving around so freely. This seems to do the trick, now it is working as intended, but other than that it is a great product and wold definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: T. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great swing!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! Bought for our 3-month-old granddaughter to have our house and she likes it so much we bought one for her to have at home, too. The rocking “creak” is a little bit loud, but the classical music it plays is just lovely. Assembly is pretty easy. Base takes up about a 3’ x 3’ area. It rocks sideways, which she seems to prefer for napping, and front to back, which suits her better for when she’s awake. The mobile does not turn in circles (would be awesome if it did). We always turn it off before taking her out as other reviewers advised.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Ingram

customer_reviews.title: This swing is O.K.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don't know if it's the swing itself, or my child...but she hates this thing. The head support that is on it hits her head in a really weird spot, and she doesn't look comfortable at all. I put her in the swing and she cries and cries. We bought this to replace our old swing that broke on us...and she didn't mind the old swing, but she HATES this one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kapp

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this swing but it is docked on stars because motor gave out after three weeks then I had to get s replacement which took five days when I think it should have been expedited considering how soon it broke. When it swings it makes a little noise but they all do. Overall like the swing once it worked. I love that it swings multiple ways. Assembly was easy but instructions have to be read carefully when assembling bouncy part
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Would rather just have a swing
customer_reviews.text: The rocker doesn't rock, it just vibrates like a bouncer but louder. I was excited about this feature because I wanted to unconnect and take it with me to the kitchen or laundry room. When I turn it on it it's not soothing and the sound keeps my baby awake but irritated, I can't imagine It's good for her ears.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, suped up swing - excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great swing! We had originally bought the Fisher-Price Snugapuppy swing for our newborn, but it was so loud. The motor literally made a grinding noise. So, we returned that and went without a swing for a month and a half or so. After a fair amount of research, we ordered this and it is whisper quiet! It makes only the sound you would expect it to - just a normal swinging sound that is not annoying at all. Love that it can swing two ways, has six speeds, music, nature sounds, a vibration option, and two incline settings. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Gift to new parents
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is quiet, sturdy, and can lull a baby to sleep faster than a car seat in a moving car. The seat easily detaches when Mom or Dad wants to move to another area of the house, but not disturb baby to take him/her along. I wish the mobile would rotate, but it doesn't and, for that, it has four stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great product/sanity saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this swing. It has been a sanity saver when baby is fussy! It was easy to assemble and is not heavy. I am able to move this in to any room with ease. The music and white noise are great as well as noise level of both. The mobile doesn’t turn, but doesn’t really bother baby. The only dislike I have, is there is no head support for newborn. I read reviews before I purchased. Many of the reviews I read complained about this. I use the head support I use in the carrier and it is perfect! Great price, no bothersome clicks or noises, and has definitely helped us get through some rough and fussy days.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I'll definitely recommend this swing
customer_reviews.text: Very soft cover for seat..it's definitely worth the price, honestly it looks more expensive than it was. Only thing I disliked was the instructions aren't detailed enough. It's easy to assemble once you figure out which is which (legs were a little confusing) over all it is super cute and most importantly my 3 month old granddaughter approves. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got the 4moms Mamaroo swing first and baby did not like it so I switched to this and he loves it. Falls asleep shortly after being put in it and seems quite content. It is difficult to put together with the instructions but I managed fine. It is also quite noisy so will be contacting Graco in hopes of fixing it but honestly hes so happy in it I will put up with the clicking if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The Sleep-Maker
customer_reviews.text: There will be a reckoning coming when our son outgrows this swing. It really works to put him to sleep but is also a good and safe place for him to sit while we're doing other things, and it's really convenient that the rocker detaches so it can be moved from room to room. AC cord does not fully couple, leaving some of the ground shielding exposed / visible which caused some issues early on. It does also make a fairly obnoxious clicking sound, but everyone kind of gets used to it after a while.
customer_reviews.author: J. GOLDBERG

customer_reviews.title: My baby absolutely loved this swing and my husband and I loved it ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby absolutely loved this swing and my husband and I loved it even more since it made our baby so happy. This is our third baby and second swing. I love how it detached from main holder so the baby is portable. He came with me in the bathroom while I showered and in the kitchen while I cooked. He loved the vibrator in the seat and it calmed him down quickly- and usually put him to sleep. He's six months now and just about out of it, but this was hands down the best baby purchase we made. It does make a clicking noise as other reviewers have said, but it never bothered us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quite machine
customer_reviews.text: This swing is quiet and worked great the 1st few months. I like that you can detach the swing part and take to different rooms and still the option of battery operated vibration for the seat. Recently the speed of the swing is very slow even on high speed setting. I have reached out to Graco and will update with their response.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Friend

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I have now been through 2 of these and both have stopped working after a couple of weeks. Definitely would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Santana

customer_reviews.title: Loud!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are correct, this is loud! The cover for the battery doesn't attach properly so it rattles, it makes a clicking sound, and the arm makes noise as it rocks. For $130, I had expected better. Too much hassle to return so I've accepted the 20% refund Amazon has offered since we're keeping it. Here's hoping it doesn't get louder before the baby outgrows it!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Unbearably loud
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this swing. It has 6 speeds and a variety of songs and nature sounds BUT the swing itself makes a constant loud swinging sound. The removable bouncer chair’s vibration is also loud and only works half the time. We have to keep wiggling and tightening the screws repeatedly to get the vibration to stay on. Also, think it’s done that the mobile doesn’t detach with the bouncer chair. This swing has major design flaws. I would not recommend it. Very disappointed in Graco.
customer_reviews.author: MelRae

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Baby Swings on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: We really love this product. First of all, the assembly was easy to do. Well written instructions with good visuals. Just love the adjusted swing features with the recorded sounds of nature and classical music. It really rocks the baby to sleep and preoccupies him so we can get things done around the house. And the price is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Blueavatar008

customer_reviews.title: Sensor is broken/malfunctioning. Swing worked for only 1.5 months
customer_reviews.text: After having this 2 months the sensor from the rocker stopped working. The swing will no longer turn on and this has been a pain since the swing has finally helped our little one nap. Any time the rocker is lifted and placed back onto the swing the "on" light flickers, but does not stay lit and the swing does not kick on no matter what setting you have it on. I have seen numerous You Tube videos with people complaining about similar issues (may not be same model, but it still doesn't turn on when the dial is turned).
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together, poor directions.
customer_reviews.text: *have not used product yet, will update once I have* This rocker is VERY hard to put together. The directions are not easy to follow. We found a YouTube video that was helpful. From our experience, all of our Graco products are incredibly difficult to put together and the directions are hard to follow. Based on that alone I would advise others to research other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Searcy

customer_reviews.title: Vibration doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I would of loved if the vibration actually worked. I bought it soley for that reason. If I wanted a musical rocker. There were way cheaper alternatives. I saw a lot of other reviews stating that it didn’t work. But I thought that would of been fixed by now. At least my baby likes it. Puts her to sleep instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Katt frost

customer_reviews.title: Better than Momaroo
customer_reviews.text: Great swing, much better than that overhyped momaroo. Swing is detachable, which is great if you need to take the baby with you around the house. Has a D-cell battery compartment so the whole swing can be wireless. Downside is, the vibration feature is very noisy, and the music is incredibly low depending on which tune you choose. The nature sounds are extremely low while the musical sounds are at a good volume. But overall, love this swing. Very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: YasHus

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my now 3 month old granddaughter. It's been the best purchase yet. Works great! Has multiple settings for speed and music. Tilts back enough for baby to sleep comfortably. Onlytwo opportunities are the mobile doesn't move and we had a hard time putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: So I got this off my registry for the first month it was alright she never really liked it because she only wants to be in someone’s arms but I use it for bottle feeding. I give it 3 stars because the vibration is so loud and after only two months it won’t swing no more but is making a loud cranking noise, good thing I got in touch with graco and they sent out a new one It’s also very big not good for a small living area
customer_reviews.author: damona

customer_reviews.title: Motor stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about a month. The swing motor stopped functioning properly, and is now useless as a swing. Also the little mobile doesn’t rotate, or do anything for that matter. It just sits there. Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Good swing while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: This swing was an absolute godsend for when it was functional. My daughter was only 15lbs which was well below the weight limit and the motor stopped working and made a loud grinding sound. My options were to send it back for an exchange or go through hoops and send videos and pictures to Graco, both were a pain. You can press your luck and try the swing. If it's worth it to you to go through the trouble of returning it after it breaks, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my twins. The vibration in the seat doesn't work in either of them. Also, when the swings are in motion, the motor clicks so bad going back and forth I find them unusable. One good thing is that one twin has reflux and I can safely put her in the swing for naps to keep her upright.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree'

customer_reviews.title: Recline handle is in wrong place
customer_reviews.text: This swing is a very good swing, our baby is 11 months and she's a heavy baby, she sleeps in it every day still. The only issue I have with it is that the recline handle is in the wrong place, because of how big our baby is it's right where her head rests... that's the only reason I couldn't give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good product but there are some things to consider
customer_reviews.text: Batteries are not included. After about a week the swing started making noise which could wake up a baby. The cover in the battery nest for the seat was broken and doesn’t hold batteries. I taped it, but make terrible noise when it vibrates. However, the swing itself is very helpful and I can do some work around the house now
customer_reviews.author: N. Schaller

product_meta.title: Graco DuetSoothe Baby Swing and Rocker, Winslet Light Beige/Light Green
product_meta.description:
Color:Light Beige, Light GreenThe best moments in the day are the ones spent with baby, so make the most of precious time with Graco’s Duet Soothe Swing + Rocker. This ingenious swing has a seat that doubles as a rocker, giving you the flexibility to move around the house while keeping baby cozy and close-by. In swing mode, three seating positions give baby the option to sway side-to-side or swing back-and-forth – whatever he prefers Pack and Play With added features such as a plug, vibration, and music, the Graco Duet Soothe Swing + Rocker has all the options baby will love. DOWNLOAD PRODUCT INSTRUCTIONS Care and Maintenance FROM TIME TO TIME CHECK YOUR SWING for loose screws, worn parts, torn material or stitching. Replace or repair the parts as needed. Use only Graco replacement parts. TO CLEAN SEAT COVER, refer to your care tag on your seat pad for washing instructions. NO BLEACH. TO CLEAN FRAME, use only household soap and warm water. NO BLEACH OR DETERGENT. EXCESSIVE EXPOSURE TO SUN OR HEAT could cause fading or warping of parts. 

Problem Solving 



SWING WON’T OPERATE: 

1. No batteries in swing. 

2. Batteries dead. 

3. Speed setting too low. 

4. Batteries in backwards — check “+” and “-”. 

5. Corrosion on battery terminals. Rotate batteries in place against terminals, or clean with sandpaper or steel wool if corrosion is severe. 

6. Baby grabbing swing legs. (Discontinue use.) 

7. Push swing to start. 

SEAT DOESN’T SWING VERY HIGH: 

1. Control setting too low. 

2. Blanket hanging down, causing increased wind resistance. 

3. Batteries too weak. 

4. Baby too heavy or too active. (Discontinue use.) 

5. Soft carpet (swings higher on hard floors).

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Option to plug in or use batteries, Best with Polaroid D batteries; Swing: For babies from 5.5 to 30 pounds Rocker: For babies from 5.5 to 25 pounds
2 products in 1: Removable infant swing seat doubles as a rocker
3 seating positions so baby can sway side to side or swing front to back
Rocker carry handle allows you to keep baby by Your side
Vibration with two speed settings keeps baby relaxed. Maximum recommended height is 27 inches (68.2 cm)

specifications.Care instructions: Machine wash, spot or wipe clean
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,821 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
